errors.name: TokenAccountNotProvided
errors.msg: required token account is not provided

errors.msg: required token mint is not provided

errors.msg: not an ATA for the given token

errors.msg: not enough swap markets in the path

errors.msg: this price provider is not supported to be used with custom price feed

errors.msg: oracle timestamps are larger than required

errors.name: OracleTimestampsAreSmallerThanRequired
errors.msg: oracle timestamps are smaller than required

errors.msg: synthetic token price is not allowed

errors.name: InvalidReceiverForFirstDeposit
errors.msg: invalid owner for the first deposit

errors.name: NotEnoughMarketTokenAmountForFirstDeposit
errors.msg: not enough market token amount for the first deposit

errors.name: NotEnoughGlvTokenAmountForFirstDeposit
errors.msg: not enough GLV token amount for the first deposit

errors.name: InvalidMinOutputAmount
errors.msg: invalid min output amount for limit swap order

errors.name: OrderKindNotAllowed
errors.msg: the order kind is not allowed by this instruction

errors.msg: claimable collateral for holding cannot be in output tokens

errors.name: FailedToCalculateGlvValueForMarket

errors.msg: GLV max market token balance amount exceeded

errors.name: ExceedMaxGlvMarketTokenBalanceValue
errors.msg: GLV max market token balance value exceeded

errors.msg: GLV: deposit is not allowed with the given market

errors.msg: GLV: shift max price impact exceeded

errors.name: GlvShiftValueNotLargeEnough
errors.msg: GLV: shift value is not large enough

errors.name: TokenDecimalsChanged
errors.msg: The decimals of token is immutable
